author: dankrad.eth
content: Would it be an option to make it so that the configuration is specific to slot times? So if slot time is 12s the millisecond subdivisions are applied, but for all other values it will still default to 1/3 of the slot for each subslot?

author: dankrad.eth
content: Right, but the times don't really scale proportionally. Maybe it's good enough for testnets though

author: potuz
content: Yes it's not implied that they should be constants, but it's so that we can test more efficiently. We rely on shorter slot times when testing in CI and on Kurtosis constantly and having a single configuration instead of a myriad of them would make it much better devex
